entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of rain beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 5 mm. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
